title: Rachael Lee shows off her HUGE oval cut diamond engagement ring
text:
NRL star Braith Anasta proposed to his girlfriend Rachael Lee on Tuesday with the help of their three children.

And now the couple have shared details of Rachael's diamond engagement ring to fans online.

The sparkler was designed by Shannakian Fine Jewellery and features an oval cut 4.28ct diamond set in an 18ct rose gold band.

Rachael Lee has showed off her HUGE oval cut diamond engagement ring after Braith Anasta proposed on Tuesday

Braith had the ring created in May and waited for the perfect moment to propose to Rachael.

The couple began dating in 2016 and share daughter Gigi, one, together while Braith has daughter Aleeia, five, with his ex Jodi Anasta, and Rachael Lee has an older son Addison, eight, from a previous relationship.

Taking to Instagram on Tuesday, Rachael announced her engagement by sharing a short video of Braith's romantic proposal.

Shining bright! The ring was designed by Shannakian Fine Jewellery and features an oval cut 4.28ct diamond set in an 18ct rose gold band

Time is right: Braith had the ring created in May and waited for the perfect moment to promise to Rachael

In the footage, the couple's three children, Aleeia, Gigi and Addison, wore matching T-shirts which spelled out the phrase, 'Will U marry me?'

The former Canterbury Bulldogs player then stepped forward, took out the ring and asked: 'I love you, bubba. Will you marry me?'

She also shared snaps of the couple celebrating their engagement with family and friends at a restaurant.

Loved-up: The couple began dating in 2016 and Rachael announced her engagement by sharing a short video of Braith's romantic proposal to Instagram on Tuesday

Rachael wrote: 'My future husband and my three darling babies surprised me with the most beautiful, perfect proposal!'

'I've never been so surprised and blown away - it was pure perfection, I'm so in love and happy! We're getting married!

She continued: 'Braith, thank you for a perfect morning and the best surprise ever. I love you always.'

Following their special engagement, the loved-up couple enjoyed a meal at a restaurant with family.
description: NRL star Braith Anasta proposed to his girlfriend Rachael Lee on Tuesday with the help of their three children. And now the couple have shared details of Rachael's diamond engagement ring.
authors: Mary Mrad For Daily Mail Australia
